task.title: Selecting a Document Portion in ContentMap

context.p: You can select any portion of a document.
To select a portion of a document in the ContentMap, do the following:

step.cmd: Indicate the beginning of the portion.

info.p: Click the beginning of the portion in the ContentMap.

fig.title: Cursor at the beginning of the portion in the ContentMap.

step.cmd: Indicate the end of the portion.

info.p: Indicate the end of the portion in the ContentMap one of these ways:

choice.p: Holding down the Shift key, click the end of the portion.
Press Shift-UpArrow/Shift-DownArrow as many times as needed.

fig.title: Document portion selected in the ContentMap.
